title: Green Circle
des: A vibrant gardening community platform where users can share tips, explore gardener profiles, and join plant care discussions. Built with React, Firebase, MongoDB, and Node.js.
features: Tips Table with filtering by difficulty
Trending Tips section with live Like updates

title: Echo Journal
des: Features include responsive design, dynamic blog creation and updates, category filtering and search, wishlist management, detailed blog pages with comments, featured blogs with sortable data tables, newsletter subscription.
features: Blog creation, update, and category filtering

title: WeFit
des: WeFit is a next-gen fitness platform built to connect health enthusiasts, personal trainers, and community members all in one place. Whether you're starting your journey or looking to elevate your fitness game, FitConnect helps you discover trainers, explore classes
features: Browse experienced trainers and view their availability
Ask questions, share tips, and vote on popular topics
